application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details part pursuant to the discharge of Condition 11 (Part b) (Fire Statement) of planning permission reference 63099/APP/2023/1608, dated 10-04-2024, for the 'The demolition of existing structures and redevelopment for Use Classes E(g)(iii), B2 and B8 (applied flexibly) including hard and soft landscaping, servicing and associated works.'
site_name: LAND AT AINSCOUGH CRANES, UNIT 84, HAYES INDUSTRIAL PARK
decision_conditions: The Applicant has failed to provide the Building Control Decision Notice or equivalent to demonstrate the development would be safe for all building users in accordance with Policy D12 of The London Plan (2021).
